summary:
- This module defines a payload handling system for aiohttp, providing various payload classes (BytesPayload, StringPayload, IOBasePayload, etc.) to encapsulate different data types (bytes, strings, file-like objects, JSON, async iterables) for HTTP requests.
- It includes a registry (`PAYLOAD_REGISTRY`) to map Python types to corresponding payload classes, enabling automatic payload selection based on input data.
